T02D3134:295b-0: @295b * // de bzhin gshegs pa bdun gyi sngon gyi smon lam
T02D3134:295b-1: gyi khyad par rgyas pa zhes bya ba'i mdo sde
T02D3134:295b-2: bklag cing de bzhin gshegs pa bdun mchod de /
T02D3134:295b-3: smon lam gdab pa'i dchog mdo sde las btus te rim par bklag pa /
T02D3134:295b-4: dkon mchog gsum gyi bden pa dang /
T02D3134:296a-1: sems dpa' thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs dang /
T02D3134:296a-2: tshogs gnyis yongs su rdzogs pa'i mnga' thang chen po dang /
T02D3134:296a-3: chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa'i stobs dang /
T02D3134:296a-4: bcom ldan 'das sman gyi bla bee d'urya'i 'od kyi
T02D3134:296a-5: rgyal po la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa bdun
T02D3134:296a-6: dang / ston pa bde bar gshegs pa dpal sh'akya
T02D3134:296a-7: thub pa 'khor dang bcas pa gdan 'dzom pa'i pho
T02D3134:296a-9: mchod pa'i tshogs sbyar ba 'di rnams ji ltar de
T02D3134:296a-10: bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi sngon gyi smon lam
T02D3134:296a-11: khyad par can gyis bsgrubs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing
T02D3134:296a-13: bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag med kyi zhing gi bkod
T02D3134:296a-14: pa'i yon tan lta bu dang ldan par gyur te
T02D3134:296a-15: / sa gzhi rin po che sna tshogs kyi rang bzhin lag mthil ltar mnyam pa /
T02D3134:296a-16: mchod pa phul du phyin pa sna tshogs dang phung po gsum pa'i mdo dang /
T02D3134:296a-17: bzang po spyod pa'i smon lam las 'byung brgya mtsho
T02D3134:296a-18: thams cad kyis rgyas par gang zhing rgyan klubs pa
T02D3134:296a-19: dang ldan par gyur cig /'phags pa gdan 'dzom pas
T02D3134:296a-20: kyang / de bzhin du byin gyis brlabs shing bzhes
T02D3134:296a-21: te longs spyod par gyur cig / de skad lan
T02D3134:296a-22: kyang / gsum bzlas / yang de'i rjes la dkon mchog gsum gyi bden pa dang /
T02D3134:296a-23: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs dang /
T02D3134:296a-24: tshogs gnyis yongs su rdzogs pa'i mnga' thang chen po dang /
T02D3134:296a-25: chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa'i stobs kyis de bzhin du gyur cig ces lan gsum bzlas /
T02D3134:296a-26: mchod pa'i tshogs bden pas byin gyis brlabs pa'i 'og tu 'phags pa spyan drang ba /
T02D3134:296a-27: pus mo btsugs te me tog blangs thal mo sbyar nas tshig 'di skad ces /
T02D3134:296a-28: shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan gyis mi
T02D3134:296a-29: thub pa na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
T02D3134:296a-30: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mtshan legs par
T02D3134:296a-31: yongs bsgrags dpal gyi rgyal po zham 'bring ba byang
T02D3134:296a-32: chub sems dpa'i 'khor bye ba khrag khrig dang bcas
T02D3134:296a-34: de bzhin gshegs ba bdun po 'khor dang bcas pa rnams dgongs su gsol /
T02D3134:296a-35: bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po rnams kyis slad
T02D3134:296b-0: ma'i dus lnga brgya ba tham la @296b dam pa'i
T02D3134:296b-1: chos ltar bcos pa 'byung ba na /
T02D3134:296b-2: sems can las kyi sgrib pa sna tshogs kyis bsgribs pa /
T02D3134:296b-3: nad sna tshogs kyis lus gzir ba /
T02D3134:296b-4: mya ngan dang sdug bsngal sna tshogs kyis gtses pa /
T02D3134:296b-5: phongs par gyur pa'i sems can rnams thams cad rjes
T02D3134:296b-6: su bzung zhing lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang
T02D3134:296b-7: phan pa dang bde ba'i slad du /
T02D3134:296b-8: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thabs mkhas pa mang po dang /
T02D3134:296b-9: sngon gyi smon lam gyi khyad par rgyas pa bzang zhing rlabs che ba dang /
T02D3134:296b-10: mthu dang byin gyi rlabs dpag tu ma mchis pa mnga' ba la brten te /
T02D3134:296b-11: che ge mo la sogs pa 'gro ba mang po bskyab pa'i slad du /
T02D3134:296b-12: la gon skyabs dang dpung gnyen du spyan 'dren zhing mchis na /
T02D3134:296b-13: mchod pa'i tshogs sbyar ba'i pho brang gi dkyil 'khor
T02D3134:296b-14: 'dir gshegs shing gdan 'dzom pa chen po mdzad de
T02D3134:296b-15: byin gyis brlabs par ci gnang /
T02D3134:296b-16: da ltar bdag cag gi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom
T02D3134:296b-17: ldan 'das dpal sh'akya thub pa gdul bya'i dbang gis
T02D3134:296b-18: 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir mya ngan las 'das pa'i tshul
T02D3134:296b-19: bstan kyang 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag tu de
T02D3134:296b-20: bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par rol pa sna tshogs kyis
T02D3134:296b-21: 'gro ba'i don mdzad cing bzhugs pa yang de bzhin
T02D3134:296b-22: gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po dang /
T02D3134:296b-23: sngon gyi smon lam khyad par can las glengs te /
T02D3134:296b-24: bdag cag rnams mnga' ris kyi gdul bya phyag mtshan
T02D3134:296b-25: du bzhes pa'i nang du gtogs te bka' drin thob
T02D3134:296b-26: pa'i 'phro mchis pa tsam la brten te che ge
T02D3134:296b-27: mo la sogs pa 'gro ba mang po bskyab pa'i
T02D3134:296b-28: slad du mgon skyabs dang dpung gnyen du spyan 'dren
T02D3134:296b-29: cing mchis na / mchod pa'i tshogs sbyar ba'i pho
T02D3134:296b-30: brang gi dkyil 'khor 'dir gshegs shing gdan 'dzom pa
T02D3134:296b-32: byin gyis brlab par cig nang /
T02D3134:296b-33: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang /
T02D3134:296b-34: dpal phyag na rdo rje dang /
T02D3134:296b-35: rgyal ba'i sras po skyabs grol la sogs pa byang
T02D3134:296b-36: chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag sngon
T02D3134:296b-37: de bzhin gshegs pa bdun gyi smon lam khyad par
T02D3134:296b-38: rgyas pa'i mdo sde bka' stsal ba'i tshe /
T02D3134:297a-0: mdo sde byin gyis brlabs shing de bzhin gshegs pa'i @297a * //
T02D3134:297a-1: bka' sgrub par thugs bskyed pa de dag thams cad

T02D3134:297a-3: po bskyab pa'i slad du mgon skyabs dang dpung gnyen
T02D3134:297a-5: mchod pa'i tshogs sbyar ba'i pho brang gi dkyil 'khor
T02D3134:297a-6: 'dir gshegs shing gdan 'dzom pa chen po mdzad de
T02D3134:297a-7: / byin gyis brlab par ci gnang /
T02D3134:297a-8: sngon de bzhin gshegs pa gdan 'dzom pa chen pos
T02D3134:297a-9: bkas btad cing so so nas kyang lha'i tshig bden
T02D3134:297a-10: pas mdongs gsol du zhal gyis bzhes te /
T02D3134:297a-11: dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor rnam bzhi skyong bar mdzad
T02D3134:297a-12: cing zhal gyis bzhes pa'i lha'i dbang po brgya byin
T02D3134:297a-13: dang / rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung dang /
T02D3134:297a-16: rnam thos kyi sras la sogs pa phyogs skyong ba
T02D3134:297a-17: thams cad kyis kyang che ge mo la sogs pa
T02D3134:297a-18: 'gro ba mang po bskyab pa'i slad du mgon skyabs
T02D3134:297a-19: dang dpung gnyen du spyan 'dren zhing mchis na /
T02D3134:297a-20: mchod pa'i tshogs spyar ba'i pho brang gi dkyil 'khor
T02D3134:297a-21: 'dir gshegs shing gdan 'dzom pa chen po mdzad de
T02D3134:297a-22: / byin gyis brlab par ci gnang /
T02D3134:297a-23: sngon de bzhin gshegs pa bdun gyi sngon gyi smon
T02D3134:297a-24: lam gyi khyad par rgyas pa'i mdo sde 'chang ba
T02D3134:297a-25: dang / mchod pa la sogs pa'i sems can de
T02D3134:297a-26: dag phyag mtshan du bzhes shing bsrung bar zhal gyis
T02D3134:297a-27: bzhes pa gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po ji

T02D3134:297a-39: gnod sbyin gyi snge dpon chen po bcu gnyis po

T02D3134:297b-3: byin gyis brlab par ci gnang /
T02D3134:297b-4: skabs 'dir lha klu spyan drang ste /
T02D3134:297b-5: phyogs skyong 'jig rten skyong ba dbang dang ldan //
T02D3134:297b-6: thugs rje thabs mkhas thugs dam dkyil po che //
T02D3134:297b-7: lha dang drang srong gshin rje srin po klu //
T02D3134:297b-8: rlung lha gnod sbyin bgegs gza' rgyu skar bcas //
T02D3134:297b-9: de dag so so dbang po'i skur ston pa //
T02D3134:297b-10: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten skyong ba bzhugs so 'tshal //
T02D3134:297b-11: bstan pa rgyas pa'i slad du spyan 'dren na //
T02D3134:297b-12: 'gro ba'i don phyir mchod kyis gshegs su gsol /
T02D3134:297b-13: sa man dza: de ltar spyan drangs pas thams cad
T02D3134:297b-14: kyang rdzu 'phrul gyis nam mkha' la byon par bsam
T02D3134:297b-15: mo // de nas phyag 'tshal ba 'greng phyag bdun gyis te /
T02D3134:297b-16: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
T02D3134:297b-17: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mtshan legs par yongs bsgrags dpal
T02D3134:297b-18: gyi rgyal po zhabs 'bring ba byang chub sems dpa'i
T02D3134:297b-19: 'khor dpag tu med pa dang bcas pa la phyag
T02D3134:297b-21: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
T02D3134:297b-22: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che dang zla ba
T02D3134:297b-23: dang padmas rab tu brgyan pa mkhas pa gzi brjid
T02D3134:297b-24: sgra dbyangs kyi rgyal po byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor
T02D3134:297b-25: dpag tu med pa dang bcas pa la phyag 'tshal
T02D3134:297b-27: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
T02D3134:297b-28: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser bzangs dri med rin chen
T02D3134:297b-29: snang brtul zhugs grub pa byang chub sems dpa' bye
T02D3134:297b-30: ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas kun nas bskor
T02D3134:297b-31: ba dang bcas pa la phyag 'tshal lo skyabs su
T02D3134:297b-32: mchi'o // de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
T02D3134:297b-33: dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan med mchog
T02D3134:297b-34: dpal byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs grangs med pas bskor
T02D3134:297b-35: ba dang bcas pa la phyag 'tshal lo skyabs su
T02D3134:297b-36: mchi'o // mchi'o // de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
T02D3134:297b-37: pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos bsgrags
T02D3134:297b-38: rgya mtsho'i dbyangs la byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dpag
T02D3134:297b-39: tu med pas bskor ba dang bcas pa la phyag
T02D3134:298a-1: dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
T02D3134:298a-2: chos rgya mtsho mchog gi blos rnam par rol pa
T02D3134:298a-3: mngon par mkhyen pa byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs grangs
T02D3134:298a-4: med pas kun nas bskor ba dang bcas pa la
T02D3134:298a-6: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
T02D3134:298a-7: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sman gyi bla
T02D3134:298a-8: bee d'urya 'od kyi rgyal po 'khor byang chub sems
T02D3134:298a-9: dpa' nyi ma ltar rnam par snang byed dang /
T02D3134:298a-10: zla ba ltar rnam par snang byed la sogs pa
T02D3134:298a-11: byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs grangs med pa dang bcas
T02D3134:298a-12: pa la phyag 'tshal lo skyabs su mchi'o //
T02D3134:298a-13: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
T02D3134:298a-14: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpal sh'akya thub pa la phyag
T02D3134:298a-16: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang /
T02D3134:298a-18: skyabs grol la sogs pa la gus par phyag 'tshal lo skyabs su mchi'o //
T02D3134:298a-19: lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang /
T02D3134:298a-20: rgyal po chen po bzhi la sogs pa dam pa'i
T02D3134:298a-21: chos skyong ba thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo skyabs
T02D3134:298a-22: su mchi'o // gnod sbyin gyi snge dpon chen po ji 'jigs la sogs te /
T02D3134:298a-23: gnod sbyin gyi snge dpon chen po bcu gnyis la phyag 'tshal lo skyabs su mchi'o //
T02D3134:298a-24: 'phags pa'i tshogs de dag thams cad la mchod yon dang byug pa /
T02D3134:298a-28: gdugs dang ba dan la sogs pa dngos su ci 'byor pa 'di dag dang /
T02D3134:298a-29: phyogs bcu na bdag pos yongs su ma bzung ba'i lha dang mi'i rdzas dam pa /
T02D3134:298a-30: bde ba'i yo byad phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dang /
T02D3134:298a-31: gzungs dang rig pa'i mthu dang /
T02D3134:298a-32: mos pa'i stobs kyis bskyed pa'i mchod pa'i sprin bzang po spyod ba'i smon lam las 'byung ba /
T02D3134:298a-33: rgya mtsho thams cad kyis nam mkha'i mthas klas pa /
T02D3134:298a-34: chos kyi dbyings su gtogs pa thams cad rgyas par bkang ste 'bul lo //
T02D3134:298a-37: bdag cag gis thog mam mchis pa nas 'khor ba
T02D3134:298b-0: nas 'khor ba'i tshe rabs thams cad du sdig @298b
T02D3134:298b-1: pa mi dge ba'i las mdor na mi bgyi bar
T02D3134:298b-3: bgyi bar 'os pa'i las ni ma bgyis pa la
T02D3134:298b-4: sogs pa'i dngos sdig ci mchis pa thams cad yang
T02D3134:298b-6: dus gsum gyi 'phags pa dang so so'i skye bo'i
T02D3134:298b-7: dge ba mtha' dag gi bsod nams thams cad la
T02D3134:298b-9: phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba thams cad la chos kyi 'khor lo bla na med pa bskor bar bskul lo //
T02D3134:298b-10: 'jig rten gyi sgron ma gang dag mya ngan las
T02D3134:298b-11: 'da' ba'i tshul ston par bzhed pa de dag thams
T02D3134:298b-12: cad mya ngan las mi 'da' bar 'jig rten gyi
T02D3134:298b-13: don mdzad cing yun ring du bzhugs par gsol ba
T02D3134:298b-14: 'tshal lo // bcom ldan 'das gdan 'dzom pa chen po dgongs su gsol //
T02D3134:298b-15: bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa rnams kyis /
T02D3134:298b-16: slad ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma la dam pa'i chos ltar bcos pa 'byung ba na /
T02D3134:298b-17: sems can las kyi sgrib pa sna tshogs kyis bsgribs pa /
T02D3134:298b-18: nad sna tshogs kyis lus gzir ba /
T02D3134:298b-19: mya ngan dang sdug bsngal sna tshogs kyis gtses pa /
T02D3134:298b-20: phongs par gyur pa'i sems can thams cad rjes su bzung zhing lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang /
T02D3134:298b-21: phan pa dang bde ba'i slad du /
T02D3134:298b-22: sngon bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
T02D3134:298b-23: pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bdun gyi
T02D3134:298b-25: smon gyi smon lam gyi khyad par rgyas pa rlabs
T02D3134:298b-26: po che ji ltar btab cing byin gyis brlabs pa
T02D3134:298b-27: dang / don de nyid da ltar bdag cag gi
T02D3134:298b-28: ston pa bcom ldan 'das dpal sh'akya thub pas ji
T02D3134:298b-29: ltar bka' stsal zhing byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
T02D3134:298b-32: skyabs grol la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems
T02D3134:298b-33: dpa' chen po rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das de dag
T02D3134:298b-34: gi bka' lung yang dag par sgrub pa dang /
T02D3134:298b-35: so so'i dgongs spyod rgya chen po rdzogs par bskang ba'i slad du /
T02D3134:298b-36: mdo sde'i don sgrub pa'i phrin las mdzad par 'phags
T02D3134:298b-37: pa'i bka' btags pas zhal gyis bzhes shing ji ltar
T02D3134:298b-39: lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang /
T02D3134:298b-40: rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /
T02D3134:298b-41: gnod sbyin gyi snge dpon chen po bcu gnyis la sogs te /
T02D3134:299a-2: gdan 'dzom pa'i spyan sngar mdo sde dang /
T02D3134:299a-3: mdo sde 'dzin pa'i sems can bsrung ba dang /
T02D3134:299a-4: bskyab par zhal gyis bzhes pa la sogs pa sngon
T02D3134:299a-5: 'phags pa rnams kyis ji ltar byin gyis brlabs shing
T02D3134:299a-6: bka' stsal ba'i mdo sde las 'byung ba bzhin du
T02D3134:299a-7: de bzhin gshegs pa sras dang bcas pa de rnams
T02D3134:299a-8: gdan 'dzom par mdzad pa'i pho brang gi dkyil 'khor
T02D3134:299a-9: du mchod pa'i tshogs sbyar nas gdan 'dzom pa'i spyan
T02D3134:299a-10: sngar mtshan nas brjod de mchod pa 'bul /
T02D3134:299a-11: bskul zhing smon lam gsol te /
T02D3134:299a-12: bka' drin nod cing mchis na gdan 'dzom pas sngon
T02D3134:299a-13: ji ltar byin gyis brlabs shing bka' stsal pa bzhin
T02D3134:299a-14: du mdo sde'i cho ga yongs su rdzogs par mdzad
T02D3134:299a-15: cing phan yon ji skad 'byung ba'i bka' drin thams
T02D3134:299a-16: cad che ge mo la sogs pa bdag cag gis
T02D3134:299a-17: 'phral du thob par stsal bar ci gnang /
T02D3134:299a-18: de'i 'og tu 'phags pa rnams la re re nas mchod ba 'bul zhing smon lam gdab par bgyi'o //
T02D3134:299a-19: de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan legs par yongs bsgrags dpal
T02D3134:299a-20: gyi rgyal po'i mtshan nas brjod de mchod nas smon
T02D3134:299a-22: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
T02D3134:299a-23: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mtshan legs par
T02D3134:299a-24: yongs bsgrugs dpal gyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo
T02D3134:299a-27: skabs 'dir mchod pa ci 'byor pa dbul /
T02D3134:299a-28: de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che dang zla ba
T02D3134:299a-29: dang padmas rab tu brgyan pa mkhas pa gzi brjid
T02D3134:299a-30: sgra dbyangs kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3134:299a-33: skabs 'dir mchod pa ci 'byor pa dbul /
T02D3134:299a-34: de bzhin gshegs pa gser bzangs dri med rin chen snang brtul zhugs grub pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3134:299a-37: skabs 'dir mchod pa ci 'byor pa dbul /
T02D3134:299a-38: de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan med mchog dpal la gus par phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3134:299a-41: skabs 'dir mchod pa ci 'byor pa dbul /
T02D3134:299b-0: de bzhin gshegs pa chos bsgrags @299b rgya mtsho'i dbyangs la gus par phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3134:299b-3: skabs 'dir mchod pa ci 'byor pa dbul /
T02D3134:299b-4: de bzhin gshegs pa chos rgya mtsho mchog gi blos
T02D3134:299b-5: rnam par rol pa mngon par mkhyen pa la phyag
T02D3134:299b-6: 'tshal lo // mchod do skyabs su mchi'o //
T02D3134:299b-8: skabs 'dir mchod pa ni 'byor ba dbul /
T02D3134:299b-9: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
T02D3134:299b-10: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sman gyi bla
T02D3134:299b-11: bee d'urya'i 'od kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo
T02D3134:299b-14: skabs 'dir mchod pa ci 'byor pa dbul /
T02D3134:299b-15: ston pa bcom ldan 'das dpal sh'akya thub pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3134:299b-18: skabs 'dir mchod pa ci 'byor pa dbul /
T02D3134:299b-19: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa 'jam dpal la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3134:299b-22: skabs 'dir mchod pa ci 'byor pa dbul /
T02D3134:299b-23: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skyabs grol la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3134:299b-26: skabs 'dir mchod pa ci 'byor pa dbul /
T02D3134:299b-27: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3134:299b-30: skabs 'dir mchod pa ci 'byor pa dbul /
T02D3134:299b-31: lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang /
T02D3134:299b-32: rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung dang /
T02D3134:299b-35: ku be ral sogs pa'i chos skyong ba lha'i dge bsnyen thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3134:299b-37: skabs 'dir mchod pa ci 'byor pa dbul /
T02D3134:299b-38: mthu dpal dang ldan pa'i dge bsnyen dam pa /
T02D3134:299b-39: gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon bcu gnyis la 'di lta ste /
T02D3134:299b-40: gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po ji 'jigs la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3134:299b-42: gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3134:299b-44: gnod sbyin gyi snge dpon chen po rgyan 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3134:300a-2: gnod sbyin gyi snge dpon chen po gza' 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3134:300a-4: gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po rlung la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3134:300a-6: gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po gnas bcas la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3134:300a-8: gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po dbang 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3134:300a-10: gnod sbyin gyi snge dpon chen po btung 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3134:300a-12: gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po smra 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3134:300a-14: gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po bsam 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3134:300a-16: gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po g-yo ba 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3134:300a-18: gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po rdzogs byed la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3134:300a-20: skabs 'dir mchod pa ci 'byor pa dbul /
T02D3134:300a-21: ston pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
T02D3134:300a-22: bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpal
T02D3134:300a-23: sh'akya thub pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3134:300a-26: skabs 'dir mchod pa ci 'byor ba dbul /
T02D3134:300a-27: ston pa bcom ldan 'das dpal sh'akya thub pas bdag
T02D3134:300a-28: cag la sogs pa sems can las kyi sgrib pa
T02D3134:300a-30: nang sna tshogs kyis lus gzir ba /
T02D3134:300a-31: mya ngan dang sdug bsngal sna tshogs kyis gtses pa /
T02D3134:300a-32: phongs par gyur pa thams cad rjes su bzung zhing lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang /
T02D3134:300a-33: phan pa dang bde ba'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa bdun gyi thabs mkhas pa dang /
T02D3134:300a-34: sngon gyi smon lam gyi khyad par rgyas par byin gyis brlabs shing /
T02D3134:300a-35: dpal gyi mgur nas yang dag par gsungs nas /
T02D3134:300a-36: phan yon dpag tu ma mchis pa /
T02D3134:300a-38: 'di ltar nyi zla ni dog sar lhung yang gda'/
T02D3134:300a-39: ri rab ri'i rgyal po ni gnas 'pho yang gda'/
T02D3134:300a-40: rgya mtsho chen po ni dus las yol yang gda'/
T02D3134:300b-2: bser ma ni zhags bas gzung du rung bar yang gda'i /
T02D3134:300b-3: lha dang mi'i ston pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
T02D3134:300b-4: sangs rgyas thams cad mkhyen cing thams cad gzigs pa
T02D3134:300b-5: / sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi kun du spyod
T02D3134:300b-6: pa la yongs su ma dag pa mi mnga' ba
T02D3134:300b-7: de bzhin gshegs pas legs par gsungs pa'i bka' ni
T02D3134:300b-8: gzhan du 'gyur ba ma mchis pa lags na /
T02D3134:300b-9: che ge mo la sogs pa'i don du dpal gyi
T02D3134:300b-10: mgur nas gsungs pa'i mdo sde las 'byung ba'i tshul
T02D3134:300b-11: bzhin du / de bzhin gshegs pa bdun dang /
T02D3134:300b-12: ston pa bde bar gshegs pa rnams gdan 'dzom pa'i spyan sngar mchod pa ci 'byor pa bshams te /
T02D3134:300b-13: mchod nas smon lam du gsol pa /
T02D3134:300b-14: dngos ci thog pa'i nyams kyis dpags te bgyis pa
T02D3134:300b-15: 'di tsam zhig sngon ji ltar byin gyis brlabs shing
T02D3134:300b-17: da yang gdan 'dzom pa chen pos cho ga yongs su rdzogs par bskad ste /
T02D3134:300b-18: byin gyis brlab cing phan yon ji skad bka' stsal
T02D3134:300b-19: pa bdag cag la sogs pa sems can thams cad
T02D3134:300b-20: kyis 'phral du thob par mdzad cing stsal bar ci
T02D3134:300b-21: gnang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' yang dag pa tshad mar gyur ba /
T02D3134:300b-22: 'gyur ba mi mnga' ba'i bden pa mngon sum du bstan pa ci gnang /
T02D3134:300b-23: spyir mchod pa dbul zhing bsod nams dmigs kyis /
T02D3134:300b-25: 'phags pa gdan 'dzom pa'i spyan sngar mchod pa ci 'byor ba dbul /
T02D3134:300b-26: de bzhin gshegs pa bdun gyi sngon gyi smon lam
T02D3134:300b-27: gyi khyad par rgyas pa'i mdo snge las 'byung ba
T02D3134:300b-28: bzhin du mchod pa'i tshogs sbyar ba'i pho brang gi
T02D3134:300b-29: dkyil 'khor 'dir / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
T02D3134:300b-30: pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mtshan legs
T02D3134:300b-31: par yongs bsgrags dpal gyi rgyal po dang /
T02D3134:300b-32: de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che dang /
T02D3134:300b-34: padmas rab tu brgyan pa mkhas pa gzi brjid sgra dbyangs kyi rgyal po dang /
T02D3134:300b-35: de bzhin gshegs pa gser bzangs dri med rin chen snang brtul zhugs grub pa dang /
T02D3134:300b-36: de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan med mchog dpal dang /
T02D3134:300b-37: de bzhin gshegs pa chos bsgrags rgya mtsho'i dbyangs dang /
T02D3134:301a-0: de bzhin gshegs pa chos rgya mtsho mchog gi blos rnam par rol pa mngon @301a * //
T02D3134:301a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bee d'urya'i 'od kyi rgyal po dang /
T02D3134:301a-3: ston pa bcom ldan 'das dpal sh'akya thub pa 'khor dang bcas pa spyan drangs nas /
T02D3134:301a-4: mtshan nas brjod de phyag 'tshal ba dang /
T02D3134:301a-5: mchod cing 'phags pa de dag gi smon lam khyad par can dang /
T02D3134:301a-6: bka' lung mthun par smon lam gsol pa dang /
T02D3134:301a-7: gzhan yang 'phags pa de dag gi spyan sngar sdig pa bshags pa dang /
T02D3134:301a-8: rjes su yi rang phul ba dang /
T02D3134:301a-9: bskul zhing gsol ba btab pa la sogs pa'i bsod nams ci mchis pa'i stobs dang /
T02D3134:301a-10: 'phags pa de dag gi mthu dpal dang /
T02D3134:301a-11: byin gyi rlabs kyis lha'i sras kyi zhal snga nas
T02D3134:301a-12: kyi thog ma ma mchis pa'i 'khor ba nas bsags
T02D3134:301a-14: sgrib pa ci mnga' ba thams cad byang bar gyur cig / sku la bsnyun mi mnga' zhing /
T02D3134:301a-15: sku tshe dpag tu med par ring ba dang /
T02D3134:301a-17: chab srid 'byam par rgya che zhing 'jig rten dang /
T02D3134:301a-18: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dpal phun sum tshogs pa
T02D3134:301a-19: la mnga' brnyes par gyur cig / mthar yang tshogs
T02D3134:301a-20: gnyis yongs su rdzogs pa'i g-yung drung gi sku chos
T02D3134:301a-21: kyi rgyal po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi go
T02D3134:301a-22: 'phang brnyes par gyur cig / chabs 'og tu gtogs
T02D3134:301a-23: pa'i 'bangs thams cad kyang phyi nang gi gnod pa
T02D3134:301a-24: thams cad rab tu zhi zhing /
T02D3134:301a-26: 'phral yun du legs pa'i chos bzang po la gnas
T02D3134:301a-27: par gyur cig / mnga' ris kyi yul khams thams
T02D3134:301a-28: cad du yang mi nad dang /
T02D3134:301a-31: dgra'i tshogs la sogs pa'i gnod pa dang /
T02D3134:301a-32: bkra mi shis pa'i pa gci yang mi 'byung ba dang /
T02D3134:301a-33: char chu dus su bab ste /
T02D3134:301a-34: lo phyugs 'phel zhing rgyas pa dang /
T02D3134:301a-35: bde skyid kyi dpal phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan
T02D3134:301a-36: par gyur cig / dam pa'i chos rang du gnas
T02D3134:301a-37: shing sgo thams cad nas dar zhing rgyas par gyur
T02D3134:301a-38: cig sgo'i bsod nams bgyid pa la mjug gi bsngo
T02D3134:301a-39: ba so so nas ji ltar dad pa bzhin du
T02D3134:301a-41: smon lam thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i 'og tu
T02D3134:301a-42: gyes kar bzod pa gsol zhing slar gshegs par gnang
T02D3134:301a-43: bar bgyi / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D3134:301b-0: mtshan legs par yongs bsgrags dpal gyi rgyal @301b po
T02D3134:301b-1: bar bgyi / dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che dang /
T02D3134:301b-2: zla ba dang padmas rab tu brgyan pa mkhas pa gzi brjid sgra dbyangs kyi rgyal po dang /
T02D3134:301b-3: de bzhin gshegs pa gser bzangs dri med rin chen snang brtul zhugs grub pa dang /
T02D3134:301b-4: de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan med mchog dpal dang /
T02D3134:301b-5: de bzhin gshegs pa chos bsgrags rgya mtsho'i dbyangs dang /
T02D3134:301b-6: de bzhin gshegs pa chos rgya mtsho mchog gi blos rnam par rol pas mngon par mkhyen pa dang /
T02D3134:301b-7: de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bee d'urya'i 'od kyi rgyal po dang /
T02D3134:301b-8: ston pa bcom ldan 'das dpal sh'akya thub pa 'khor
T02D3134:301b-9: dang bcas pa gdan 'dzom pa spyan drangs nas mtshan
T02D3134:301b-12: mdo dang mthun par smon lam gsol ba dang /
T02D3134:301b-13: che ge mo la sogs pa 'gro ba mang po'i don mdzad par gsol ba'i skabs 'dir /
T02D3134:301b-14: bdag cag dus ngan pa'i sems can spyod pa dman
T02D3134:301b-15: zhing ma dag par gyur pas ma 'tshal ba dang
T02D3134:301b-16: / bag ma mchis pa la sogs pa'i dbang gis /
T02D3134:301b-19: yid kyi spyod pa thams cad nyon mongs pa rnams dang 'dres pa dang /
T02D3134:301b-20: mchod pa'i dngos po chung zhing ngan la gtsang sbras ma phye ba dang /
T02D3134:301b-21: mdo las 'byung ba'i cho ga bzhin du ma lcogs
T02D3134:301b-22: pa la sogs pa 'khrul zhing nongs par gyur pa
T02D3134:301b-23: thams cad 'phags pa thugs rje chen po dang ldan
T02D3134:301b-24: pa thams cad la bzod par gsol zhing mchis na
T02D3134:301b-25: / thugs brtse bar mdzad de bzod par bzhes shing
T02D3134:301b-26: 'phral yun gnyis su bdag cag la sgrib pa dang
T02D3134:301b-27: gnod par mi 'gyur bar byin gyis brlab par ci
T02D3134:301b-28: / gnang / 'phags pa rnams kyis deng ngam dgung
T02D3134:301b-29: 'di'i bar du bdag cag la sogs pa 'gro ba
T02D3134:301b-30: phongs shing nyam thag pa'i sems can thams cad kyi
T02D3134:301b-31: phan pa dang bde ba'i don mdzad cing /
T02D3134:301b-32: bka' stsal pa yang da dung yang bdag cag la
T02D3134:301b-33: thugs brtse bas yang dang yang du gdan 'dzom par
T02D3134:301b-35: so so'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pa
T02D3134:301b-36: rnams su 'gro ba'i don la gshegs par ci gnang
